content: Meanwhile, on an island in the New World, the Whitebeard and Red Hair Pirate crews bid a final farewell to Edward Newgate and Portgas D. Ace at their funeral, where Marco thanks Shanks for everything he has done for him and his crew. Shanks states that although he was an enemy, he deserved their respect and even Sengoku's as well. With that said, Shanks and his crew leave silently. In his mind, Shanks says to Luffy that he must move on by relieving his emotions and crying everything out, even if he is a man.
